exceptions.tactic: intros P Q H1 p H2 H3.

exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, H4 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Unable to unify "list ?M2238" with "forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a0 a -> In a0 H4".
Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall P Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), incl P Q -> forall p : list (Term A n), inPolySet p P -> inPolySet p Q

Premises:

pickinSetp_ind : forall P : Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop, (forall (a b : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)) (H : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p)) (P0 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b -> P a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p) (exist (fun l0 : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM l0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p) H :: P0)) ->...-> P t l l0
mults_pO : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pO A n) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) b p))
eqp_pluspf_com_r : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec r p) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec r q)
mults_invTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a) p)) (pO A n)
spminusf_multTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) c nZc (mults multA (n:=n) a p) q) (mults multA (n:=n) a (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec b c nZc p q))
minuspf_inv1 : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))

``` 
intros P Q H1 p H2 H3. 
intros a H4. 
induction P. 
- inversion H2. 
- simpl in *. 
  destruct H2. 
  + rewrite H. 
    apply incl_hd. 
    apply H3. 
    apply H4. 
  + apply incl_tl. 
    * apply IHP. 
      apply H. 
    * apply H. 
    * apply H3. 
    * apply H4. 
```

original: intros P Q H1 p H2 H3. intros a H4. induction P. - inversion H2. - simpl in *. destruct H2. + rewrite H. apply incl_hd. apply H3. apply H4. + apply incl_tl. * apply IHP. apply H. * apply H. * apply H3. * apply H4.
